text: A #watershed moment in #India famed battle against #COVID19 under leadership of PM #NarendraModi. Our wait for the #vaccine is over with #Covishield from #SII and #Covaxin from #BharatBiotech approved for emergency use in India: Union HM #DrHarshVardhan. @drharshvardhan https://t.co/1EoxSfwDXy
